item.title: A New Post
item.description: My First Post After countless of days working on this blog site project, I am absolutely flabbergasted and tired for the things I have accomplished. It nearly took me 12 days! To create such a blog site… Even though I am a complete idiot when doing css or some shit, with the help of online resources and all that shenanigans, I did it! Well, I didn’t ofcourse manage to code it all one by one, all I can proudly say is that I made this
